# Phase 4: Valuation Intelligence

## Epic: Valuation Intelligence Module

**Description:** Complete AI-powered valuation platform for roofing contractors, providing real-time business valuations, value driver analysis, scenario modeling, exit readiness assessment, and actionable improvement roadmaps. Integrates with Books OS to deliver automated valuation insights with human-in-loop oversight for high-stakes decisions.

**Estimated Hours:** 480
**Status:** Not Started

### Dependencies
  - Books OS Core Platform (Phases 1-3)
  - QBO Integration and Data Pipeline
  - User Authentication and Tenant Management
  - Financial Data Normalization Engine
  - Industry Benchmarking Database

### User Stories
  - [ ] As a roofing contractor, I want to see my real-time business valuation so I can understand my current enterprise value
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want TTM SDE and EBITDA calculations so I can track my profitability metrics
  - [ ] As a contractor planning exit, I want valuation ranges with tier-based multiples so I can set realistic expectations
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want value delta tracking so I can see how my valuation changes over time
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want my management independence scored so I can reduce owner dependency risk
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want financial records quality assessment so I can improve my books for higher valuations
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want recurring revenue analysis so I can build more predictable income streams
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want operational systems scoring so I can systematize my processes
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want customer base diversity analysis so I can reduce concentration risk
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want market outlook assessment so I can understand external factors affecting my value
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want what-if scenario modeling so I can see the impact of business changes on valuation
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want to adjust recurring revenue projections so I can model subscription service growth
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want to simulate reduced owner hours so I can plan my transition strategy
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want crew productivity scenarios so I can evaluate operational improvements
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want gross margin optimization modeling so I can identify pricing opportunities
  - [ ] As a business owner planning exit, I want a due diligence checklist so I can prepare for buyer scrutiny
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want auto-assembled financial packets so I can quickly respond to buyer requests
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want CIM-style presentation outlines so I can professionally market my business
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want AR/AP aging reports auto-generated so I can demonstrate working capital management
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want KPI dashboards for buyers so I can showcase operational performance
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want weekly operational tasks so I can systematically improve my business value
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want monthly close discipline coaching so I can maintain clean financials
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want quarterly Spec Jam reviews so I can track progress on value drivers
  - [ ] As a business owner, I want prioritized improvement roadmaps so I can focus on highest-impact changes
  - [ ] As a contractor, I want effort-level estimates for improvements so I can plan resource allocation

### Acceptance Criteria
  - [ ] Feature A: Real-time Valuation Engine delivers TTM SDE/EBITDA calculations with 95%+ accuracy
  - [ ] Valuation ranges apply correct Matador tier multiples (Below Avg ~3×, Avg ~4.5-5×, Above Avg ~7×+)
  - [ ] Value delta tracking shows month-over-month and year-over-year changes with trend analysis
  - [ ] Feature B: Value Driver Scoring evaluates all 6 Matador drivers with evidence-based scoring
  - [ ] Driver scores include confidence levels and specific improvement recommendations
  - [ ] Scoring integrates with Books OS data and external market intelligence
  - [ ] Feature C: Scenario Simulator provides no-Excel what-if modeling with real-time recalculation
  - [ ] Scenario adjustments immediately update EBITDA/SDE and multiple projections
  - [ ] Simulation results show ROI and payback periods for proposed changes
  - [ ] Feature D: Exit Readiness generates comprehensive due diligence checklists
  - [ ] Auto-assembled packets include all required financial documents and KPIs
  - [ ] CIM outlines follow industry standards for professional presentation
  - [ ] Feature E: Roadmap Agent delivers personalized weekly/monthly/quarterly tasks
  - [ ] Task prioritization based on value impact and implementation effort
  - [ ] Progress tracking with measurable KPIs and milestone celebrations
  - [ ] All features implement automation tiers: ≥95% auto-commit, 80-94% flagged review, 60-79% human confirmation, <60% exception queue
  - [ ] Human approval required for valuation changes >$50K or tier changes
  - [ ] Complete audit trail for all valuation calculations and driver score changes
  - [ ] Integration with QBO as source of truth per Books OS Constitution
  - [ ] Mobile-responsive interface for on-the-go valuation monitoring
  - [ ] Real-time sync with Books OS for immediate impact of financial changes
  - [ ] Export capabilities for sharing with advisors, lenders, and potential buyers

### Technical Notes
- Follow Books OS Constitution automation tiers
- Human-in-loop for confidence < 80%
- Audit trail required for all valuation outputs

## Feature Breakdown by Module

### Feature A: Real-time Valuation Engine
**Stories:** 1-4 (Real-time valuation, TTM calculations, tier-based multiples, value delta tracking)
**Estimated Hours:** 120

### Feature B: Value Driver Scoring Engine  
**Stories:** 5-10 (All 6 Matador drivers: management independence, financial records, recurring revenue, operational systems, customer diversity, market outlook)
**Estimated Hours:** 120

### Feature C: Scenario Simulator
**Stories:** 11-15 (What-if modeling for recurring revenue, owner hours, crew productivity, gross margin)
**Estimated Hours:** 96

### Feature D: Exit Readiness & Deal Room Builder
**Stories:** 16-20 (Due diligence checklists, auto-assembled packets, CIM outlines, AR/AP reports, KPI dashboards)
**Estimated Hours:** 96

### Feature E: Valuation Roadmap Agent
**Stories:** 21-25 (Weekly tasks, monthly coaching, quarterly reviews, prioritized roadmaps, effort estimates)
**Estimated Hours:** 48

## Implementation Priority
1. **Feature A** - Foundation for all other features
2. **Feature B** - Core value driver analysis
3. **Feature C** - Scenario modeling capabilities  
4. **Feature E** - Actionable improvement guidance
5. **Feature D** - Exit preparation tools
